name: Synthetic Poetry
description:
Collaborate with one of three AIs to create short poems.

Instructions

To begin, select an AI of the three offered in the menu screen. My personal favorite is the John Keats AI.

To play, just write a line, press enter and let the AI come up with the next line, then repeat.

You can use the buttons in the lower right corner to restart the game or copy the poem to your clipboard.

Have fun!
